question.body: Which pancreatic duct joins the common bile duct before entering the duodenum?

response.feedback: Correct. The duct of Wirsung is the main pancreatic duct that fuses with the common bile duct.
Incorrect. The hepatopancratic ampulla is after the pancreatic duct and the common bile duct fuse.
Incorrect. The Accessory duct runs directly to the duodenum.
Incorrect. This is another name for the accessory duct which runs directly to the duodenum.
